div.p: When I came out of Uni and I was applying for jobs and it was becoming a bit disheartening because I wasn’t getting anywhere
I would say it’s about a year, I think I was, because of what I went to Uni for, the whole I think I came back down to earth with a bang
because I just thought I’m going to do this course and I’m going to be in a music video and West End and actually the reality is
very limited numbers will actually be a movie star but then there is so many other great, you know, jobs within that industry so it was getting
my head round what am I going to do to be honest but that was the thing.
